alert.note: Alert for Central Black Hills; Rapid City (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 9:23PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Pennington County through 1000 PM MDT... At 922 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mystic, or 7 miles north of Hill City, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hill City, Johnson Siding, Silver City, Hisega, Mystic, Rockerville, Pactola Reservoir, Sheridan Lake and Keystone Wye. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
